<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Search contacts</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/contacts/_search"}></MethodEndpoint>



Search contacts by a filter.
Support:

| Provider    | Search By       |
| ----------- | --------------- |
| Hubspot     | Email           |
| Salesforce  | Email           |
| Pipedrive   | (Not Supported) |
| MS Dynamics | (Not Supported) |


## Request
